pages.text: Using a $(item)$(l:shooting_stars/infused_star_piece)infused starstone$() on an pedestal, will empower it, granting it the ability to $(thing)repair$() the placed sword slowly, should it be damaged.$(br2)Thanks to the magical power of the starstone, it will also display a $(thing)glow$() around the sword, as long as its being repaired.
